short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the New Tab page with a Start.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows you to set a custom bookmark page with division into 2 columns, in each of which you can add bookmark widgets or website page widgets. Widgets can be moved between these columns, as well as within each column. 
In each widget (if it is not a widget with a URL address) you can sort items with a special button.
Each widget and widget element has a context menu.
It is possible to change the language: Russian/English, and also to change the theme: light/dark.
